name: titles
desc: The titles module provides a straightforward means to place text in the Viewer.

properties.name: Switch Property View
properties.desc: Edit the renderable (red) port properties for the module.

properties.name: Title Type
properties.desc: The Title Type allows the user to choose between a 2D title in the overlay, or a 3D title that is in the model space.

properties.name: X Coordinate
properties.desc: The X Coordinate specifies the location of the lower left edge of the title in 2D overlay space (i.e. from -1.0 to 1.0).

properties.name: Y Coordinate
properties.desc: The Y Coordinate specifies the location of the lower left edge of the title in 2D overlay space (i.e. from -1.0 to 1.0).

properties.name: Z Coordinate
properties.desc: The Z Coordinate specifies the location of the lower left edge of the title in 2D overlay space (i.e. from -1.0 to 1.0).

properties.name: X Coordinate 3D
properties.desc: The X Coordinate specifies the location of the lower left edge of the title in coordinate space.

properties.name: Y Coordinate 3D
properties.desc: The Y Coordinate specifies the location of the lower left edge of the title in coordinate space.

properties.name: Z Coordinate 3D
properties.desc: The Z Coordinate specifies the location of the lower left edge of the title in coordinate space.

properties.name: Width Height Ratio
properties.desc: The Width Height Ratio allows you to stretch or compress the font to adjust for non-square Viewer induced distortions.

properties.name: Title Text
properties.desc: The Tile Text is the text to use for the Title.

properties.name: Font Type
properties.desc: The Label Type allows the user to select between three font types. Forward Facing Fonts will always be aligned to the View.  TrueType fonts are standard fonts.  Line fonts are low impact fonts which perform better when large numbers of labels are generated.

properties.name: Forward Facing Style
properties.desc: Forward Facing Style allows the user to align the labels to an appropriate view and to alter the basic layout of the font.

properties.name: TrueType Font Style
properties.desc: The TrueType Font Style allows the user to alter the basic look of the font.

properties.name: Line Font Style
properties.desc: The Line Font Style allows the user to alter the basic look of the font.

properties.name: 3D Font Settings
properties.desc: 3D Label Settings allow the user to align the labels to an appropriate view.
